game.name: Treasure Hunter Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Dive into the exciting world of finding long forgotten treasures. Grab your metal detector and set off to explore the countryside. What today looks like a peaceful meadow might have been the scene of a fierce battle in the past, hiding now the valuable artefacts. Ready to dig in the past?
